name: .LOGICLYLIB
summary: Learn about .LOGICLYLIB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a LOGICLYLIB file with Logicly (Windows, Mac, Web). To do so:
Select File â†’ Import Integrated Circuit Library... from Logicly's menu bar.
Navigate to and open your LOGICLYLIB file.
The integrated circuits your LOGICLYLIB file includes will then appear in the Custom section of Logicly's left-hand sidebar. Note that Logicly will not re-import any duplicate integrated circuits.
